summary: Session features testing complete - All features working correctly. Pagination on Riconciliazione page, /api/cedolini endpoint, smart/analizza limit parameter, and Import Unificato progress bar all verified.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All session features working correctly. Riconciliazione page now loads quickly with pagination (limit=25 default). 'Carica altri' button works in Banca/Assegni/Stipendi tabs. /api/cedolini endpoint returns cedolini with pagination and filters. Import Unificato has progress bar during upload.

riconciliazione_pagination.details: Page loads quickly with limit=25. 'Carica altri' button visible and functional in Banca, Assegni, Stipendi tabs. Shows loading indicator during pagination. Button displays count of loaded items.

api_cedolini.details: Endpoint returns cedolini with pagination. Supports filters: anno, mese, dipendente_id, limit. Returns total count and filter info. Currently 1 cedolino in DB (2026/01).

smart_analizza_limit.details: Limit parameter works correctly. Response times: limit=10 ~1s, limit=25 ~2s, limit=50 ~4s. Much faster than previous 20+ seconds with limit=200.

import_unificato_progress_bar.details: Progress bar code present in ImportUnificato.jsx (lines 342-368). Shows current/total files, percentage, and animated progress bar during upload.
